topics.body:
God damn it Texas!
If you're wondering what I mean by this is the Texas Republican convention has "changed their views on homosexuality" and have no adopted "gay cure therapy" as their official stamp on what they believe on glbt.

Less of a "god damn it Texas" and more of a "god damn it Republicans!"
